blockId.description: a numberic number representing this block; sequential. 0 represents genesis block

pollHash.description: the hash of the poll that this block belongs to. Note a pollHash is used as an identifier for a poll

timestamp.description: a UNIX timestamp representing when this block was mined

prevHash.description: hash of the block which preceded this block

responses.description: an array of poll response objects that are locked in the block

minerAddress.description: the address of the person who mined this block

nonce.description: an arbitrary number used for mining
